title: Punjab University Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Project Associate Post
description: Punjabi University has declared the latest job notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Project Associate Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.Pharm can grab this chance and apply for the Punjab University Recruitment 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts.
